notes: Severe over-segmentation with a very high number of spurious automatic boundaries across stable vocal and harmonic passages. Only three structural transitions were correctly detected
column5: resulting in very low precision (13.6%) and low recall (30%). Multiple musically salient transitions (pre-chorus
column8: and ending sections) were entirely missed
column9: indicating poor alignment with formal pop-song structure despite correct detection of intro and one mid-song transition.
